column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Best spaghetti with meat sauce I've ever had. Not too sweet
column4: delicious. Did not like that it didn't come with bread or salad
column5: had to order both separately. Even the freakin marinara sauce to dip the bread in was amazing. They only had reduced-calorie ranch
column6: but the waiter assured me it was flavorful. Ordered it on the side with a red wine vinaigrette (just in case). He was right. The ranch was bomb. Lastly
column7: the portion size...ridic. An order of spaghetti can feed 3 people
column8: or 2 greedies :) Bread is enough for a whole table.
